de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientAskMe


  • public interface IClientAskMe
    textobject suggestion panel. The operator opens a question. In the customer history panel(down left panel) appears the textobject suggestion panel. The searching for the textobjects is starting automatically.
    was:
    ClientAskMe.java

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String P_COMPLETED
      It's used in Map as key.
      static String P_RESULT
      It's used in Map as key.
      static String P_TEXT
      It's used in Map as key.
      static String P_VETO
      It's used in Map as key.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> postTextObjectRecommendation(List<TextObject> textobjects, Subproject subproject)
      Is called after a recommendation for a TextObject has been shown
      Map<String,Object> preTextObjectRecommendation(Subproject subproject, String text)
      Is called before a recommendation for a text object is viewed.

    • Field Detail

      • P_VETO

        static final String P_VETO
        It's used in Map as key. The value can be: 1. true if the suggested text objects are to be ignored and aren't to be viewed in the suggestion panel
        2. false if the text objects are to be viewed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • P_RESULT

        static final String P_RESULT
        It's used in Map as key. The value is a Vector of the TextObjects viewed in the suggestion panel.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • P_COMPLETED

        static final String P_COMPLETED
        It's used in Map as key. The value can be: 1. true if the ptme may not start 2. false if the ptme may start
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • P_TEXT

        static final String P_TEXT
        It's used in Map as key. The value can be: String if the value must be used for the search null if the default text must be used for the search
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • preTextObjectRecommendation

        Map<String,Object> preTextObjectRecommendation(Subproject subproject,
                                             String text)
        Is called before a recommendation for a text object is viewed.
        Parameters:
        subproject - subproject of the opened question
        text - the subject and the body to find the relevant textobjects for the question
        Returns:
        Map with return values:
          boolean P_VETO - if true, no textobject recommendation will be calculated
          String P_TEXT - if available, search with this text instead of the input
          Vector<TextObject> P_RESULT - textobject recommendations from the businessrule
          boolean P_COMPLETED - if true, don't start the PTME for recommendation, result will be the outcome instead
        was:
        preTextbausteinVorschlag

      • postTextObjectRecommendation

        Map<String,Object> postTextObjectRecommendation(List<TextObject> textobjects,
                                              Subproject subproject)
        Is called after a recommendation for a TextObject has been shown
        Parameters:
        textobjects - List of TextObjects
        subproject - current subproject
        Returns:
        Map not in use, irrelevant
        was:
        postTextbausteinVorschlag
